page.title: 07 Fircroft, Aldridge
page.content: This is an example of building techniques in the mid 1980's. Fircroft is a building site of 6.5 acres situated at the north of Aldridge near Walsall. Four different kinds of Houses are to be built on Fircroft. The Merlin and Albany are 3 bedroomed houses and the Viscount and Kestrel are 4 bedroomed houses. 64 houses are to be built on the site. The prices range from Â£35,500 for the Merlin to Â£51,500 for the Viscount. Although all the houses will have fairly large front and back gardens many people have the opinion that all the rooms in the houses are very small considering their price, for example one bedroom in the Viscount had just enough room for a bed and a wardrobe. We all agreed that the houses are not very good value for money considering other houses built in the 1980's.
